title: News24.com | Makhura calls on Gautengers to stay put during lockdown
description: Gauteng Premier David Makhura has called on residents to remain where they are to prevent the spread of the coronavirus after 366 people in the province tested positive.
content:
Gauteng Premier David Makhura has called on residents to remain where they are to prevent the spread of the coronavirus after 366 people in the province tested positive.
On Wednesday, the country recorded 709 Covid-19 cases. This is a nearly-30% increase fro… [+4191 chars]
